name: @4mbl/tsconfig
description: TypeScript configuration templates for various environments.
author: 4mbl

scripts.release: npm run get:version && npm run build && npm publish && npm run delete:latest && git add . && git commit --file version.txt && git push && npm run delete:version
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run release
scripts.release:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run release
